overview:
Director Jo Jamieson is operationally responsible for running Berkeley PR. Here, she leads a team of dedicated technology PR consultants tasked with helping businesses in the Thames Valley and London to raise their profile through public relations.

Jo has experience of working with hardware and software companies, consultancies, digital experts and web-based businesses in the B2B and consumer tech sectors. Current and former clients include global companies such as Ricoh, SAP and Hitachi Capital as well as niche providers including Adax, Affiliate Window and Reading Room.

“I joined Berkeley PR having earned my wings at a London-based technology agency. My clients know they can trust me and my team to deliver a comprehensive PR programme that mirrors their business objectives. I will invest time in building good relationships with my clients and can be relied upon to give an honest opinion without resorting to fluff and spin.”

Jo is powered by tea, and always wants to know where her next meal is coming from. Outside work, she enjoys running, cycling, hiking and camping. Though not when it’s especially wet.
